about_the_game:
In 'Cats & Castles', as King of the Cats, you must build, manage, and defend the greatest kingdom a cat has ever seen.

The land where you built your kingdom isn't the safest place. You can't always be certain of what's next. Is your army strong enough for the next wave? Do you have enough food to feed your people? Can you afford the next card? Use your strategic mind and city-planning skills to overcome the randomized deck, events, and enemies!

Plan ONE STEP ahead


In "Cats and Castles," you need to manage three resources to survive in these dangerous lands. You need food supplies for feeding your people, gold for buying cards, and a military to defend your kingdom. With randomized decks, you cannot always get the building you need. For example, you priotized to purchase military cards to create a mighty army to destroy any monsters that attacked your kingdom, but now you do not have enough food supply for your people, and hunger is happening. To prevent this, always plan for the future. If one of your economies starts to go bad, the fall of his kingdom may come faster than you expected. Create a strong economy to feed your cats enough food to survive and defeat any monster who dared to attack.

COMBO YOUR BUILDINGS


Time passes quickly as you build your kingdom, and what buildings produce alone is not enough to survive. You need to combo your buildings! So you can't produce enough food, and hunger is at the door? Just combo your wheat farm with your mill. You do not have enough gold to buy the next card, and you need to produce more gold. Just combo your grocer with your farmer cats. With 30+ Buildings, you can build the combo your kingdom needs. With easy-to-use menus, you can see how much each building produces and consumes and which buildings it can combo with.

DIFFERENT LANDS, DIFFERENT MONSTERS


As you progress through your journey, you will realize that not every land consists of trees and grass. Some lands are full of volcanoes, icebergs, or sand as far as the eye can see. You and your people need to adapt to this new and harsh environment. Also, do not forget the monsters who live in these lands. Every land comes with its own unique monsters and bosses! Create and improvise new strategies for each environment. With a little bit of luck, you and your cat people will conquer this lands in no time!

Choose your cards wisely and balance your economy, food supply, and military. It's your responsibility to defend your kingdom from monsters with your mighty cat soldiers.
